name: A Home in Darkness
description:
Important: Read this devlog before buying the game to not be disappointed: Early Access Release! But...

A Home in Darkness is a Horror game inspired by classics such as "Alone in the Dark" and "Silent Hill".

However unlike in those games you aren't shooting your way through enemies, but instead perform rituals to fend of supernatural powers in your home! You need to figure out what entities will haunt you at night and based on that research arcane spells in old tomes. Oh and be careful when performing the rituals: Slight changes, like using the wrong candle or setting up the ritual at the wrong place may have terrible consequences.

You might be able to survive one night, but can hold on until all evil has been purged?
